attributes.action: Strongly condemn India for its continued massacres and genocide in Kashmir.
attributes.additional_details: Mass graves have been identified all over Kashmir by human right activists believed to contain bodies of thousands of Kashmiris of enforced disappearances India has tried to bury the truth and silence the locals through sexual violence along with crackdowns associated with killings and illegal detentions.
attributes.background: India has for long got away with atrocities in Indian controlled Kashmir under the guise of being a "victim" of terror Amnesty international has recently exposed India's violent record in Kashmir. More recently the murder of 80 civilians by the armed forces who also tried to blind them with pellets.
